languages.text: Whenever a creature dies from Burning, the wielder gains +30% damage with this weapon for one round. Does not stack

traits.locale_text: Whenever a creature dies from Burning, the wielder gains +30% damage with this weapon for one round. Does not stack

languages.text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Когда любое существо в бою получает смертельный урон от {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, персонаж наносит на 30% больше урона этим оружием в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

Whenever any creature in combat suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethal{/g} damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

Whenever any creature in combat suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethal{/g} damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

languages.text: Çatışmadaki herhangi bir yaratık {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} sebebiyle ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında, kullanan kişi bu silahla +%30 daha fazla hasar verir. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Çatışmadaki herhangi bir yaratık yanma sebebiyle ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında, kullanan kişi bu silahla +%30 daha fazla hasar verir. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.

Çatışmadaki herhangi bir yaratık {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} sebebiyle ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında, kullanan kişi bu silahla +%30 daha fazla hasar verir. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.

languages.text: Cada vez que cualquier criatura que participe en el combate sufra daño letal por el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, el portador inflige un +30 % más de daño con esta arma durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que cualquier criatura que participe en el combate sufra daño letal por el efecto quemadura, el portador inflige un +30 % más de daño con esta arma durante 1 asalto. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 每当战斗中任何生物由于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果承受致命伤害时，这把武器造成的伤害提高30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当战斗中任何生物由于燃烧效果承受致命伤害时，这把武器造成的伤害提高30%，持续一轮。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'une créature subit des dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} mortels, l'utilisateur inflige +30 % de dégâts avec cette arme pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'une créature subit des dégâts de Combustion mortels, l'utilisateur inflige +30 % de dégâts avec cette arme pendant 1 round. Non cumulable.

languages.text: 戦闘中の生物が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}により致命的なダメージを受けると、使用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間この武器によるダメージが+30%増加する。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中の生物が炎上により致命的なダメージを受けると、使用者は1ラウンドの間この武器によるダメージが+30%増加する。この効果はスタックしない。
戦闘中の生物が炎上により致命的なダメージを受けると、使用者は1ラウンドの間この武器によるダメージが+30%増加する。この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Erleidet eine Kreatur im Kampf tödlichen Schaden durch {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, verursacht der Träger mit dieser Waffe 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +30 % mehr Schaden. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet eine Kreatur im Kampf tödlichen Schaden durch Verbrennen, verursacht der Träger mit dieser Waffe 1 Runde lang +30 % mehr Schaden. Nicht stapelbar.
